articles.title: Pankaj Tripathi says he only ate khichdi for 60 days while playing Atal Bihari Bajpayee: ‘It was also cooked by me’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Pankaj Tripathi recently shared how during the shoot of Ravi Jadhav-directed Main Atal Hoon, in which he essays the role of late PM Atal Bihari Vajpayee, he only ate khichdi to get the emotion of his character right.
